Author: Witty-Revolution8742

Comment: You more or less have to, in this case. The SuperHeavy / Starship is a very large rocket that has to be launched from a remote location, and SpaceX is planning on launching it very frequently. That requires a lot of people and large facilities. Those people either commute a long way or live in the company town. Same for the Kennedy Space Center, which includes a large industrial area. Boca Chica is relatively much farther away from large population centers than KSC.  But yes, obviously Musk is a narcissist with an endless need to control people, so it's no surprise that he wants to build his own kingdom.
